subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ inclusion of Lucas Duda in their holiday e-card, as well as their pass on a deal with shortstop Jhonny Peralta, might signal how much the team is willing to spend in the free-agent market.
snippet: The Mets’ inclusion of Lucas Duda in their holiday e-card, as well as their pass on a deal with shortstop Jhonny Peralta, might signal how much the team is willing to spend in the free-agent market.
